name: Mini Her & Goddess Perfume Duo Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Set Description:This is an on-the-go selection of BURBERRY scents for her. It is a perfect way to explore BURBERRY‚Äôs signature fragrance range..About the Bottle:The travel-friendly gift set is wrapped in a seasonal iteration of the BURBERRY Check for holiday gifting..This Set Contains:- 0.16 oz/ 5 mL BURBERRY Her Eau de Parfum
ingredients: BURBERRY Her Eau de Parfum: .Alcohol Denat., Fragrance, Water, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Limonene, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Linalool, Bht, Alcohol, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Ext. Violet 2 (Ci 60730), Red 33 (Ci 17200), Yellow 5 (Ci 19140)...BURBERRY Goddess Eau de Parfum: .Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Propylene Glycol, Aqua/Water/Eau, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Coumarin, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Benzyl Cinnamate, Alcohol, Citral, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Anise Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Geraniol, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red 4 (CI 14700), Ext. Violet 2 (CI 60730).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Decide which BURBERRY scent to wear and spray onto skin, focusing on your pulse points at the wrists, inner elbows, neck, and heart for a long-lasting fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn‚Äôt expecting to love these fragrances as much as I do, so this duo was surprising! Both scents have a great projection and our long lasting. I particularly love Goddess, which is a spicy vanilla scent that smells sexy and sophisticated. These minis were the perfect tester size, and I‚Äôll definitely buy a full-sized bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Goddess perfume (I have a full size) and wanted to get this set to give to a friend who has similar perfume tastes as I do for Christmas. Let me tell you- I can't give this to her- It looks like a free gift with purchase. They are 5 ml each. I got a free birthday gift from Sephora this month that was 7.5 ml. I can't believe this is $50 (cdn). While they smell great, this is laughably tiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this Her and Goddess Duo set for a few weeks and I absolutely love it. The notes in this set, are romantic and super feminine. I love wearing the Her scent in the daytime and the Goddess scent at night, because it is bold and captivating. I'm so in love with this set, that I plan on buying the regular sized bottles soon. Definitely a 10/10 for me!

reviews.review_title: Two Lovely Scents To Switch Up Your Routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This set is incredibly adorable.  It gives you the chance to test drive two distinct scents that you can switch up with your mood.  Even though they're minis, they'll last a decent while cause a little goes a long way.  I would describe them both as soft scents, but the difference lying in the notes that come through most.  For me that was a sophisticated fruity for Her and a musky woodsiness for Goddess.  Both lovely and unique to each other.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best duo! Each have their own unique scents but both are unforgettable. Definitely a new fav for me!

reviews.review_title: Great size and long lasting scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm super picky about my perfumes but also want something that smells great. It‚Äôs nerve wracking and saddening to buy a huge bottle of perfume (sometimes they aren‚Äôt cheap) only to not like the scent. These are great samplers though!! Smell great, not overpowering but long lasting, and the picture size for a purse!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This duo set is perfect for travel. I am a fan of both gourmand and floral scents, so this is ideal. This is a great way to explore and sample the perfumes. I do wish it had come in a spay though. I think I prefer Goddess over Her. I would repurchase especially for travel or a gift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I did receive these from Influenster in exchange for my Yes yes yes, a million times yes! Burberry Her a little sweet ‚Äúso demure‚Äù. Goddess is a little sexier for evening time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love having these two distinct scents in one set. The Her scent is a great day fragrance, light but noticeable. The Goddess scent, on the other hand, is perfect for evenings or special events.The mini sizes are ideal for travel or keeping in my purse, so I can refresh throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Her is a beautiful clean, fresh scent. It reminds me of a more grown up feminine Daisy Eau So Fresh. I would love to repurchase the full size, because it smells so beautiful and could totally be my everyday scent. Goddess is a gourmand vanilla scent that is sexy. It‚Äôs not my typical fragrance, but I will be wearing for going out and special occasions. The set comes with two very small perfumes that don‚Äôt have sprays, they just dab. I personally do not want a dabber, so I think this set is not worth it based on the size and lack of spray. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Her is my fav! My daughter loves to play in my perfume. Lol so I bought he own mini

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These smell so good! Her is very fruity, sweet, youthful, and playful. Goddess smells more mature. It has a vanilla-lavender scent (trust me..it smells better than it sounds). With both scents, a little goes a long way and they both lasted several hours

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received these from Influenster for review. These Burberry fragrances are wonderful. They‚Äôre not too sweet and contain just the right touch of floral notes that I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these scents, but the Goddess is my favorite out of the two. I lean more towards musky/vanilla, but the scent for Her is still nice! If you want a mixture of scents, these minis are just for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this and absolutely loved it. Warm and sweet, a small dab goes a long way. Really cute set too, I like that I can easily fit it in my purse and go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wore this perfume the other day and really enjoyed it. The scent isn‚Äôt too strong but lasts for hours. I would have to test it to see if it lasts all day but it‚Äôs definitely one of my new favorite scents. My boyfriend complimented my scent a few times when I wore the pink one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've really enjoyed this mini set! This was my first time trying these fragrances and I love them both! I think Goddess is perfect for the cooler weather and Her will be a great scent for spring and summer. They both last all day for me without having to reapply and project very well. I highly recommend this set!

reviews.review_title: Great scent and if you‚Äôre interested in layering
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the perfume set from Influenster to review.  I love the idea of layering the scents.  I tried them one by one also.  The pink Her is sweet, which is not my go to.  The Goddess is slightly musky and definitely one that enjoyed.  I found that the tiny bottles made it difficult to apply, so I only used a very small amount because of how it‚Äôs applied.  I might even use these and layer them with a 3rd perfume.  The size is great for travel.  On my most recent work trip, I took them and was so happy that there were no leaks.  The tops just pop on and off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this gift from influenster. When I tried both perfumes I loved the smell of both the durability but my favorite was the Goddess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely obsessed with both of these fragrances. I had smelled Her before and loved it, but Goddess is new to me and I am IN LOVE. It is a warm vanilla, but the lavender gives it a little twist that keeps it from being too sweet and sugary. It is the perfect autumn/winter scent. This set is a great gift for the fragrance lover in your life - I guarantee they will love it. And the bottles are so cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes
reviews.review_text: My wife got this as a review. She uses it quite a bit but she thinks it‚Äôs too sweet for her liking. Seems like it‚Äôs for a younger crowd

reviews.review_title: A must for my Perfume Girls
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After alternating between the Burberry Her Eau De Parfum and Burberry Goddess Eau De Parfum over the last few weeks, I‚Äôm struggling to decide on which one is my favorite. Goddess is lovely, feels fun and vibrant with sweet notes of vanilla with a twist of jasmine that lingers once the dry down. Her is sexy and dark, jasmine with a musky amber. This is my first experience with Burberry fragrance which has left me craving more. Just delicious

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this little gift set. Minis are always a win for me it‚Äôs an easy way to try out both of these scents without going way over budget. I think this set would make the perfect stocking filler gift. I love the packaging simple and easy slide out box. The bottles are nice, however I really wish mini bottles could have a spray mechanism. The tops are a bit hard to get off that‚Äôs my only real complaint. Also the Burberry Goddes bottle feels a bit more expensive and presents more luxury to me than the Burberry Her bottle. Burberry Her is a very fruity floral scent to me. I would wear it more in spring/summer. Burberry Goddess is a more rich vanilla and amber scent to me. In my opinion it‚Äôs a more everyday or year round scent. I find both to last fairly well throughout the day and have received  compliments on both. Overall I think the set is quite versatile with two very different scents which can be worn for different moods or occasions. I would definitely recommend this as a nice gift for any woman.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing! The set is the perfect way to sample both scents and pick what you want the full size of!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a mini bottle gift set and was really excited to try the 2 perfumes. I don't like that they are not spray bottles, so you have to use with your finger. I do not care much for the Goddess scent. After a while it seemed to have a tobacco undertone. I felt like an older lady at a casino. I REALLY like the scent for the Burberry Her though. Sweet, with a currant tone. I would definitely wear the Her regularly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample and I have to say I‚Äôm glad I had a chance to try.  Both scents are wonderful.  I prefer Goddess over Her.  I feel like Goddess is more sultry with the spicy and warm fragrance. Her is more floral.  But cannot go wrong with either.  Great mini set,  only wished it was a spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great set for gifting!! Such cute packaging!  This is a great choice for someone who wants to experience both scents.  Goddess is a deeper scent with a touch of musky and vanilla-ish type scent  Burberry Her is a lighter airy scent with hints of berries and jasmine.  These two scents are both amazing and I have added them to my collection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a hard smell to describe just know people will love the scent. I have gotten compliments on the smell men and women. If you‚Äôre not sure what to try try this one. It‚Äôs a light smell but you can also smell it from a distance.

reviews.review_title: amazing add to a mini collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scents to have in your mini collection! I just give it 4 out of 5 since they released right away other set which was bigger, and i wished I hold on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very tiny but they‚Äôre nice to throw in your purse or for travel. The scent is not too strong and it will last! I recommend trying the mini versions before splurging on the full size bottles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve used this perfume for a few weeks now and I love the smell of the clear one better than the brown. It‚Äôs easy to apply and lasts all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the scents but I hate that it doesn‚Äôt have a spray nozzle makes it hard to use

reviews.review_title: Mini Her & Goddess Perfume Duo Set
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Burberry Goddess set smells great. The pink bottle has a very light fragrance. The gold bottle has more of a heavier scent. They both smell amazing. They remind me of how I would want to smell when I‚Äôm on vacation. I only gave it four stars because I was expecting a spray bottle. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Cute sample size of Burberry fragrances.  The size is a good way to test the fragrances but for the price it doesn‚Äôt seem worth it for the size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try out this set, Burberry has great fragrances however this pair reminded me of my grandmother‚Äôs perfumes back in the day.  Very strong and powerful, too over powering for my liking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scents and such a cute size great for travelling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wore both Burberry Goddess and Burberry Her for a week to give these fragrances my honest review.  Starting with Burberry Goddess she opens with a warm vanilla with lavender, cacao and ginger. However the dry down is a lovely Vanilla absolute. This is definetmy a lovely fall fragrance I love lavender so the perfect harmony between the rich velvet yet smooth vanilla is quite addictive. This is such an easy reach for and it last a good 6+ hours on me. This fragrance will garner many compliments.  Now Burberry Her is that it girl. She is fun, fruity and flirty. With top notes of strawberries, raspberries, blackberries, a bit of sour cherry lemon, orange and black currant. Her opens with a rush of strawberry that begins to dry down to a whipped strawberry milkshake. This is such a juicy fragrance that is sure to get you a compliment or two. This is definitely a favorite Burberry Her is a sure winner if you love fruity fragrances like myself she does not disappoint.

reviews.review_title: Nice scents that you could wear day or night
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this duo has 2 very distinct fragrances yet they seem to go together so well. It would make a great gift for someone who appreciates feminine scents. The Her scent is quite sweet, perhaps just a bit too sweet smelling for me. The packaging is fine, nothing special. I would rate this individually at 3 stars. The Goddess scent is very vanilla, but a mixture of vanillas that give it a certain depth that you don‚Äôt expect when reading the description. The packaging is nice and I will get a lot of use out of this one. I would rate it individually at 4.5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way it smells even my Husband and my Family love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love smelling amazing, then this 2 piece Burberry set review is for you!  First we have Burberry Her, which is such a captivating and feminine scent. Its beautiful jasmine and amber scent is incredibly sexy and feminine. I have never been a big fan of the warmer scent families, amber, vanilla, musk, etc...but the way they layered the subtle amber scent to the jasmine is... *chef's kiss*! I have approximately 50 fragrances in my collection and the only scent that my husband will stop what he is doing to smell my wrists or neck is Burberry Her. I also get so many compliments when I wear it. If you like alluring scents, this is a must for your collection!  Next is Burberry Goddess. It initially sparked skepticism in me, given my aversion to most vanilla perfumes. However, this fragrance defied expectations and became a truly enchanting experience. The blend of lavender, vanilla, and a subtle, woodsy note (perhaps patchouli) is simply beautiful. From the first sniff, a wave of unexpected joy washed over me. The scent is rich and evocative, conjuring up heartwarming memories of my grandmother. This is a testament to the power of scent. While it's a stronger fragrance, this is a positive attribute for me. The longevity is impressive, with the scent lingering beautifully throughout the day. If you're hesitant about vanilla perfumes like I was, I encourage you to give this one a try. It's a beautifully crafted fragrance that is both comforting and uplifting, making it a perfect choice for those who seek a rich, long-lasting, and truly memorable scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One gives you a light floral smell and the other one has more sweet notes. I prefer the Her over the Goddess. Definitely like a day and night combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

Goddess is a really nice scent but strong for my taste. It  smells like vanilla and citrus. It‚Äôs good if you like vanilla but I prefer lighter scents.

reviews.review_title: Everyday scent and a bold night must have!

reviews.review_text: After wearing these two Burberry scents for a few weeks I am in love! The Pink Her scent is light and feminine and a beautiful mix of clean and floral scents. Then to shake it up you have to Goddess scent is bold and more masculine. The Goddess smells rich and oaky but yet still feminine. Wonderful scents by Burberry!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

Goddess is a vanilla/lavender blend to my nose, while Her is a fruity floral. I wish they‚Äôd start including spray nozzles with these minis, for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. First off let me say that this sample set is a dabber and not in a spray bottle so that might have affected my experience with the perfumes.   Burberry Her is light and fruity and soft. I had to bring my nose to the points where I put it to smell it. It‚Äôs a nice none offensive scent that is mass appealing. Would probably be good in office spaces.   Burberry Goddess is a vanilla. Thicker scent than Her. But I could only smell it well in the opening and I am not sure if I went anosmic to it or it just faded. It is unfortunate because it‚Äôs a beautiful scent. Also, my friend wears this as one of her signature scents and I can only smell her when I meet her which is usually when we are going out and then I can‚Äôt smell her anymore. ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è.

They last nicely on the skin as you wear them and I don‚Äôt have to reapply because of that. The gift set is perfect for someone who wants to try the scents but not splurge on a full size bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Burberry Her & Goddess Two-Piece Fragrance Festive Set is a delightful treat for fragrance enthusiasts. Both scents in the set are beautifully crafted and offer a lightly sweet aroma that feels refreshing and uplifting.   The mini bottles are a standout feature‚Äîperfectly sized for your purse or as companions for your travels. They make it easy to carry your favorite scents wherever you go, ensuring you can refresh yourself throughout the day or during your vacation adventures.  At a price point of $35 for the set, it‚Äôs an excellent value, especially considering the quality of the fragrances. This set is not only a great way to experience two stunning scents but also an ideal gift option for anyone who loves a touch of luxury without breaking the bank.  Overall, the Burberry Her & Goddess Two-Piece Fragrance Festive Set is a charming addition to any fragrance collection. Whether you're treating yourself or someone special, this set is sure to impress with its delightful scents and practicality. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: In LOVE with these two Burberry fragrances.  Her, has always been one of my top 5 favorites.  It‚Äôs a very light, sweet scent which is my go too.  Goddess, has more of a warm, woody fragrance which I usually stay away from but this one is amazing!  I‚Äôm in love with both!

My wife loved the scent of these perfumes. I loved them also. She also liked that they came in a double pack, so she got a two for one with it. She likes to wear them for different occasions. Her favorite of the two is Her, with Goddess coming in at a close second. The scents last the entire day and don‚Äôt need to be reapplied. They are appropriate for any time of day and any activity. The set would be an excellent gift for any woman in your life, and she is sure to love it.

Burberry Her and Goddess are truly an indispensable collection for any season! Her, with its upfront fruity notes like strawberry and cherry, feels to me, delightful and light, despite the warm, woody base notes that anchor it. This fragrance feels like a perfect choice for the warmer weather of Spring, especially. It's a great way to start the day with a fresh, invigorating scent that can carry you through until evening.  Goddess, on the other hand, is a more robust and denser fragrance. It opens with a rich, spicy note of ginger, balanced by the sweet, creamy vanilla. This feels like a bolder, colder weather fragrance, perfect for those crisp autumn or winter days. It's a scent that commands attention and leaves a lasting impression.  But the true value of this collection lies in its versatility. These fragrances are not just beautiful on their own, but they also complement each other beautifully when layered. Together they make a unique fragrance that is beautiful and unique!   In the time I've been using these fragrances, I've noticed that I get more compliments when I wear them together. And the best part? A few drops in the morning have lasted me from 7 am to 8 pm during a busy work day. I've found that with other fragrances, I often need to reapply midday or even several times throughout the day. But these two have a power and longevity that's truly impressive.   So, whether you're looking for a fresh, light scent for Spring, or a rich, spicy fragrance for Fall, or even if you're just looking to expand your fragrance collection, Burberry Her and Goddess are a collection you won't want to miss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love those smells and a size of bottles. It‚Äôs an amazing Parfume for every day.

reviews.review_text: A few issues with this set. They‚Äôre more for putting on pulse points and I‚Äôd prefer them be a spray so I ended up transferring them into an atomizer. Her is bright deliciously fruity and floral, but the longevity isn‚Äôt there. It lasted one hour max on pulse points. On the other hand Goddess is warm spicy vanilla and dries down to a light sweet scent and it definitely lasts longer. The bottles are cute and small but weren‚Äôt too functional for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an on the section of Burberry scents for her it‚Äôs travel size friendly gift the smell is very good I love the packing in it cute and nice the quality of this product is good too it was easy to open and use I like the smell and like it‚Äôs travel size I can use when I am traveling or moving to another place I would like to buy it again and try another kinds of it I recommend it I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this duo! My favorite out of the two is goddess, I will definitely be purchasing a full size version of the scent. The instant I put it on, my husband was obsessed! The scent is long lasting and gives me a feeling of luxury. The only downside is that the application can be difficult because the tops of the bottles are open and I worry that I‚Äôm using more product than is necessary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs a heavy vanilla gourmand that dries down to a sweet scent that unfortunately is just not for me. It‚Äôs warm, strong & vanilla-sweet. VERY gourmand & almost sharp on me. It‚Äôs just not for my chemistry as I‚Äôve tried almost all the Burberry scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Burberry mini set is absolutely adorable! Both mini-sized perfumes smell amazing, making it a fantastic deal. It‚Äôs a great way to try out the brand‚Äôs scents and the size is perfect for travel or keeping in your bag for a quick refresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Her mini has more floral notes while the Goddess bottle has more vanilla and amber undertones. They are lovely worn separately or together. Great travel size bottles. I received these for my honest review from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The package was simple and presented the product well. Perfumes are petite, no doubt but great to allow me to have more Her and try Goddess. This would make a lovely gift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bottles are tiny (each one takes up less area than the palm of my hand), but the packaging and glassware feel substantial and classic. I love how tiny they are, frankly; they're so cute yet luxe-looking. The application style is a dab, but I don't mind it. I have heard good things about both Burberry fragrances and wanted an easy way to try both. This would make a great gift for someone who enjoys gourmand fragrances.  Personal thoughts: I love Her - it has a bright berry bubblegum note with a sophisticated touch to it. I've never smelled a fragrance quite like this one before. Goddess, while not bad by any means, felt harder for me to approach as it has a stronger projection and a dry intensity despite being a vanilla scent. It is well made, but maybe too grown up for me? Regardless, I feel open to sharing and even giving away my tiny Goddess bottle since the packaging is so well made. I do not regret this purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used Goddess as my wedding scent, but I can't afford a regular size bottle. Apparently,  Burberry fragrance bottles are refillable, so this was right up my alley! The bottle of Her was, to me, a bonus. I love them both!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In the photo, it showed four of the perfume samples, not two. I mean, these are sample sizes. They're very small, so for only two it's so not worth thirty five dollars. That's more than fifteen dollars each. Maybe if there was four of them, it might be worth it. Don't waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Both perfumes smell lovely, but the product claims to be a spray and both bottles are actually the ones you have to dip into

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: just saying you have to be braindead to look at the photo and think hmm four bottles so thats how many i'm getting when you can use your pea sized brain to look at the description to determine what youre getting.   anyways i personally like both scents but i think the set wouldnt be worth it since theyre both deluxe sample sizes which in that case just get the sephora favourites perfume set you get more perfumes anyways.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product page photo is misleading.  This item only comes with 2 fragrances not the 4 shown in the photo.  Very disappointed as I was hoping for the Her Elixir since it last much longer than the EDP.
